My name is Biluu Biluubi and I am a retired toy engineer, specializing in optical illusions (peekaboo) and bubbles. I haven't had a chance to enjoy astrophotography or travel, because I am still consulting for a daycare cooperative, providing UI and UX testing on the sandbox environment.
